rows: TheContactAddressobject schema of theBasepackage corresponds to theAddressesdetail of the contact page. The detail is connected to the section object via the requiredContactcolumn of the detail object.
Structure, position, and behavior of detail
Set up theAddressesdetail on the contact page in theContactAddressDetailV2view model schema of the detail that inherits theBaseAddressDetailV2schema of theUiv2package.

Detail object schema

Section object

The ContactAddress object schema of the Base package corresponds to the Addresses detail of the contact page. The detail is connected to the section object via the required Contact column of the detail object.
